nodes.text: The Chieftain's gaderffii, otherwise known as the Chieftain's gaffi stick, was the weapon wielded by the chieftain of the Sand People on Tatooine.
As with all other gaderffii, the chieftain's gaderffii had a slightly more ornate appearance and better construction.

The chieftain's gaderffii was a very prized possession to the chieftain; however, when Revan and his party arrived on Tatooine and provided the Sand People with the moisture vaporators needed to move camp, the chieftain was willing to give it up to Revan as a sign of gratitude before leaving.
